channel.title: Upgrade on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: UpgradeShop
item.description: UpgradeShop Details Component : Core Status : In progress Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1346 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the Module Catalog" page" Module Catalog page is displayed correctly Search for the 1-click Install" module. Install it" Module is correctly installed Go to the General Parameters > Maintenance" page. Put the shop in maintenance mode" Maintenance page is displayed correctly.
